about_the_game:
Prepare for the gripping and lustful adult cosmic adventure! 🔞 Explore different planets, build relationships, face betrayal and find trustworthy partners on your way to freeing the galaxy from Melonium exploitation!

Lust in Space 🔞🪐 is an adult point-and-click adventure revolving around an intriguing story, lore and character exploration, important decisions and fiery 18+ encounters - don’t miss your chance to save the world!

Head out on an intergalactic quest as Leon, a Peace Corps agent from Araksis, a high-tech planet bathing in the rays of 2 suns and filled with futuristic technology. Everything starts with a mission to take a look at an abandoned Earth spaceship - you discover a deactivated android named Marion there, who reveals to you the plans of his creators.

As you return home and learn more about the earthlings' struggles to find Melonium, a highly valuable material being nearly depleted now, you face betrayal from the person you trusted the most, which ends up in a series of twisted events - you’ll even have to escape the prison at one moment.

Along the journey you’ll make friends and enemies, visit various planets, discover the dangers of racing the unknown, reveal a fallen civilization and possibly even save the whole galaxy from impending doom.

Dive into this space-faring rollercoaster with android Marion, witty smuggler Lilith, former dancer Esmeri and other characters as you explore Kasaar, Titanium, Melo-Ni and other thrilling planets to save the day together!

Features:
  • Engaging and meaningful story - learn about the consequences of exploiting nature.
  • Diverse characters - outlaws, mutants, friends and betrayers, robots and agents.
  • 3D graphics - we’ve put a lot of work into visuals, animations and character design to take immersion to the next level!
  • Adult scenes - lewd content featuring various characters and environments will help you get a deeper understanding of people around you.
  • Choice-driven plot - make the right decisions and decide the fate of yourself, your close ones and maybe even the whole galaxy!
  • Intuitive game-design - you can use just one hand to explore all of this, and you’ll probably need to 😉

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work.
Specifically, it includes depictions of sexual acts, revealing outfits, nudity, sex animations, masturbation  all of which are portrayed graphically. 
These elements are integral to the storyline and character development within the game, contributing to the overall narrative experience. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Lust in Space 🔞🪐

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in an exciting space adventure in the genre of adult visual novel. In the game Lust in Space 🔞🪐 you take on the role of Leon, an agent of the Peace Corps, who, during one of his missions, finds a wrecked, deserted ship from Earth.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
